headlines.description: Chelsea ended a nine-match winless run in all competitions under Frank Lampard with a 3-1 victory over Bournemouth on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Chelsea end losing run in 1st win under Lampard

headlines.description: Hard-charging Manchester City went four points clear of Arsenal at the top the Premier League on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: City down Allardyce's Leeds amid late drama

headlines.description: — Harry Kane’s first-half header helped Tottenham to beat Crystal Palace 1-0 and keep alive their faint Europa League hopes in the English Premier League on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Spurs beats Palace to stay in hunt for European places

headlines.description: An early goal from defender Toti earned Wolves a gritty 1-0 win over Aston Villa on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wolves strike early to dent Villa's bid for Europe

headlines.description: An early goal by Mohamed Salah gave Liverpool a 1-0 Premier League win over Brentford on Saturday to keep the pressure on the top four.
headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool beat Brentford to close gap on top 4
